(1)
E. 187th Street, at the west side of Marion Avenue, showing the stairway built by the Works Progress Administration.
January 27, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
(2)

701429f-a.text:
2419 and 2415 Marion Avenue, at, and adjoining the S.W. corner of E. 187th Street.No. 2419 is a 2 story frame house, visible behind the trees on top of the embankment. No. 2415 is the garage and 3
story house on the left.
May 13, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
